name: Exterminate All Babies
description:
I can't believe this one has actual levels.

Get ready to swat babies before they reach your position.

Why?

You gotta.

¿Por qué es este juego está mitad en español, half in english?

En los noventa cuando crecí most games were in english, and you had ninguna opción pero aprender cómo the hell you play them games. Also, this game is a tribute to "Tres Acordes", una serie web que deberías ver si hablás español.

How do you jugar a esta cosa?

There are some instructions in Spanish on the help section, but here's a brief:

Move your swatter - Arrow Keys / WASD

Swat them babies - Spacebar
